Viewing Service Assembly Statistics and Status

In the graphical view of a service assembly, each box represents a service unit that has been deployed to a service engine or binding component.

  • If the box is white, then the service unit is started.

  • If the box is light gray, then the service unit is stopped.

  • If the box is dark, then the service unit is shut down.

The color of the connection link indicates the type of connection.

  • If the connection link is purple, then the connection is from a binding component to a service engine.

  • If the connection link is green, then the connection is from a service engine to a binding component.

  • If the connection link is red, then the connection is from a service engine to another service engine.

  • If the connection link is blue, then the connection is from a binding component to another binding component.

To view connection information

  1. In the left pane, select a service assembly.

  2. In the right pane, place the pointer on a connection.
